<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Unbreakable Bond](/Feats.aspx?ID=3451) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

</column>

---

You and your megafauna companion are bound together; as long as you live, it's much harder for your companion to die. If your megafauna companion gains the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition, it automatically succeeds at the recovery check to stabilize at 0 Hit Points on its turn. Additionally, your megafauna companion only dies at dying 5 rather than dying 4. Finally, the first time each day your megafauna companion would reach dying 5 and die, as long as you're still alive, your companion's dying value decreases to 0 instead.
name: Unbreakable Bond
